SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! Status messages : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" cd /d &UC4RB_OSB_HOME#\tools\configjar : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Invalid OSB home directory." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS SET MW_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_HOME#\.. call setenv.bat call %WL_HOME%\server\bin\setWLSEnv.cmd : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Unable to initialize OSB execution environment." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS ! set AGENT working directory : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="ACTION EXECUTION HAS BEEN FAILED." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS : CASE "UNIX" cd &UC4RB_OSB_HOME#/tools/configjar : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Invalid OSB home directory." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX export MW_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_HOME#/.. . ./setenv.sh . $WL_HOME/server/bin/setWLSEnv.sh : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Unable to initialize OSB execution environment." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX ! set AGENT working directory : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN &UC4RB_OSB_CMDEXEC# : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="ACTION EXECUTION HAS BEEN FAILED." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX : OTHER : ENDSWITCH

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include does the following: * Sets the weblogic and OSB path along with the system properties required by OSB. * Runs the java command prepared to perform the necessary action.
